snippet.title: WRC 8 FIA World Rally Championship - Reveal Trailer | PS4
snippet.description: Never before has the official WRC simulation been this authentic. New off-road physics on all road surfaces, completely redesigned career mode, dynamic weather, 50 teams, 14 countries, 100 tracks, weekly challenges and the eSports mode… Aim for the top in the most intense WRC experience yet!
